programme.desc: A high-school play ends in tragedy when a boy is accidentally killed during a performance. The school puts on another production of the same show 20 years later which a gang of camcorder-wielding students intend to sabotage - but nobody is prepared for the ghost of the dead boy returning to terrorise the performance. Found-footage horror, starring Reese Mishler and Pfeifer Brown.

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: A retired police detective and his family break down taking a short cut on a remote road and later find themselves attacked by savage and deformed victims of a nuclear testing project. Remake of the 1970s horror, starring Kathleen Quinlan, Aaron Stanford, Vinessa Shaw, Ted Levine, Emilie de Ravin and Dan Byrd.(n)

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes 2
programme.desc: National Guard recruits on a training mission in the desert respond to a distress call from an isolated research camp. Finding the outpost abandoned, the soldiers investigate the fate of the scientists who were working there - only to stumble into the clutches of a band of mutant cannibals. Sequel to the remake of the cult horror movie, starring Michael McMillian and Jessica Stroup.(n)

programme.title: Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A weedy flower-shop assistant grows a bizarre plant, which he discovers needs to feed on human blood to survive. It grows to a vast size and begins to talk, demanding he commit murder on its behalf. Comedy musical based on the Broadway show, starring Rick Moranis, Ellen Greene, Steve Martin and Bill Murray, with the voice of The Four Tops' Levi Stubbs.(n)

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A race of intelligent chimps vies with warlike gorillas and deadly mutant humans for control of a post-apocalyptic Earth. The fifth and final instalment in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins and Paul Williams, and featuring a cameo appearance by John Huston.(n)

programme.title: The Witches of Eastwick
programme.desc: Three single women dabble in magic to conjure up the perfect lover, and unintentionally summon Satan himself, who seduces them one by one. They come to realise the danger the lecherous devil presents and decide to end their relationships, but the infernal rogue does not take kindly to rejection. Fantasy comedy based on John Updike's novel, with Jack Nicholson, Cher, Michelle Pfeiffer and Susan Sarandon.(n)

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A colony of super-intelligent apes thrives following a global virus outbreak that wipes out much of the human race. A survivor tries to make peace with the leader of the apes, but their efforts to reach an understanding are threatened by warmongers on both sides. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Jason Clarke and Gary Oldman.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A gifted young scientist joins a secret project researching inter-dimensional travel, and return from a journey to another world granted superhuman powers. Their abilities make them the only hope for Earth's survival when a colleague who was lost on their expedition returns to wreak vengeance. Superhero adventure, starring Miles Teller, Michael B Jordan, Kate Mara and Jamie Bell.(n)

programme.title: Jeruzalem
programme.desc: Two American tourists take a trip to Jerusalem and befriend a local anthropology student who offers to be their guide to the holy city. However, their holiday takes a hellish turn when a biblical apocalypse engulfs the city, and they find themselves trapped at the centre of the mayhem. Horror, starring Yael Grobglas and Danielle Jadelyn.(n)

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A race of intelligent chimps vies with warlike gorillas and deadly mutant humans for control of a post-apocalyptic Earth. The fifth and final instalment in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins and Paul Williams, and featuring a cameo appearance by John Huston.(n)

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A colony of super-intelligent apes thrives following a global virus outbreak that wipes out much of the human race. A survivor tries to make peace with the leader of the apes, but their efforts to reach an understanding are threatened by warmongers on both sides. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Jason Clarke and Gary Oldman.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A gifted young scientist joins a secret project researching inter-dimensional travel, and return from a journey to another world granted superhuman powers. Their abilities make them the only hope for Earth's survival when a colleague who was lost on their expedition returns to wreak vengeance. Superhero adventure, starring Miles Teller, Michael B Jordan, Kate Mara and Jamie Bell.(n)

programme.title: Jeruzalem
programme.desc: Two American tourists take a trip to Jerusalem and befriend a local anthropology student who offers to be their guide to the holy city. However, their holiday takes a hellish turn when a biblical apocalypse engulfs the city, and they find themselves trapped at the centre of the mayhem. Horror, starring Yael Grobglas and Danielle Jadelyn.(n)

programme.title: Cujo
programme.desc: A family's amiable St Bernard is bitten by a rabid bat and, as the infection takes hold, the devoted dog is transformed into a vicious killer - eventually trapping a mother and her son in their car in the baking heat of an isolated junkyard. Horror based on Stephen King's novel, starring Dee Wallace Stone, Daniel Hugh-Kelly and Danny Pintauro.(n)

programme.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
programme.desc: A rebellious convict gets himself sent to a psychiatric hospital, thinking it will be easier than prison. Finding himself surrounded by institutionalised patients, he encourages them to rebel against the tyrannical head nurse. Milos Forman's Oscar-winning drama based on Ken Kesey's novel, starring Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Brad Dourif and Danny DeVito.

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: A male escort is falsely accused of murdering a wealthy woman, and his only hope of proving his innocence rests with a client reluctant to come forward and provide him with an alibi. Thriller, written and directed by Paul Schrader, starring Richard Gere, Lauren Hutton and Hector Elizondo.

programme.title: Ace in the Hole
programme.desc: An abrasive, hard-drinking reporter is reduced to working for a small-town newspaper, where he discovers a man trapped in a mine shaft. He sees a chance to revive his career, and manipulates the rescue operation to drag things out as long as possible, creating a media circus but putting the man's life in jeopardy. Billy Wilder's drama, starring Kirk Douglas and Jan Sterling.

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: A drug addled private detective unwittingly becomes embroiled in an elaborate kidnapping case in Los Angeles during the 1970s involving an old flame, her billionaire boyfriend and his wife. Comedy drama based on Thomas Pynchon's acclaimed novel, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Josh Brolin and Reese Witherspoon.

programme.title: Magic in the Moonlight
programme.desc: An English magician who exposes fake psychics is approached by his friend to prove that a medium is a fraud exploiting a wealthy family. As he watches the spiritualist at work, he begins to believe that she is the genuine article, challenging his previously unshakeable scepticism. Woody Allen's 1920s-set romantic comedy, with Colin Firth and Emma Stone.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangster's accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his boss's millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchie's crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton.

programme.title: A Fistful of Dollars
programme.desc: A mysterious gunslinger rides into a town on the Mexican border divided by two warring families. After killing the henchmen of one clan, he seems to have made it clear where his loyalties lie and is hired by their rivals. However, he is secretly planning to play them off against each other to his own advantage. Sergio Leone's Western, with Clint Eastwood making his first appearance as The Man with No Name alongside Gian Maria Volonte and Marianne Koch.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: A wage-slave in his uncle's factory has big ambitions. Just as he comes close to marrying a wealthy socialite, a poor working-class girl with whom he had a brief, casual affair tells him she is pregnant with his child. When she threatens to disclose the truth, he makes a series of decisions which bring terrible consequences in their wake. Oscar-winning drama, starring Montgomery Clift, Shelley Winters, Elizabeth Taylor,and Raymond Burr.

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: A lonely student finds her first year at university in New York a disappointing experience, with uninspiring studies and no social life. Everything changes when her mother remarries and she acquires a new stepsister, whose bizarre schemes draw her into the kind of lifestyle she had always dreamed of - and provide fresh creative inspiration. Comedy, starring Lola Kirke and Greta Gerwig.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangster's accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his boss's millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchie's crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton.

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: A Philadelphia cop is assigned to protect an Amish boy who was the only witness to a murder. Discovering the killers are rogue policemen willing to go to any lengths to cover up their crime, he is forced to go into hiding within the Amish community, experiencing a clash of cultures and unexpected feelings for the boy's widowed mother. Thriller, directed by Peter Weir, with Harrison Ford, Kelly McGillis, Lukas Haas and Danny Glover.

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: A drug addled private detective unwittingly becomes embroiled in an elaborate kidnapping case in Los Angeles during the 1970s involving an old flame, her billionaire boyfriend and his wife. Comedy drama based on Thomas Pynchon's acclaimed novel, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Josh Brolin and Reese Witherspoon.(n)

programme.title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
programme.desc: A Confederate soldier refuses to surrender at the end of the Civil War, and is branded a dangerous outlaw. Crossing America in search of sanctuary from the army and bounty hunters, he only wants solitude - but ends up with a strange assortment of travelling companions. Western, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood. With Chief Dan George and Sondra Locke.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: A wage-slave in his uncle's factory has big ambitions. Just as he comes close to marrying a wealthy socialite, a poor working-class girl with whom he had a brief, casual affair tells him she is pregnant with his child. When she threatens to disclose the truth, he makes a series of decisions which bring terrible consequences in their wake. Oscar-winning drama, starring Montgomery Clift, Shelley Winters, Elizabeth Taylor,and Raymond Burr.(n)

programme.title: The Face of an Angel
programme.desc: A journalist and a documentary-maker become obsessed with the murder case they are covering. Fact-based drama inspired by Amanda Knox's case and the death of Meredith Kercher in 2007, starring Daniel Bruhl, Kate Beckinsale and Cara Delevingne.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Boxer Rubin `Hurricane' Carter dreams of winning the middleweight world title, only to be wrongfully thrown into prison for the murders of three people in a bar. Nineteen years later, a teenager reads the fighter's autobiography and sets out on a campaign to free him. Fact-based drama, starring Denzel Washington, John Hannah, Deborah Kara Unger, Liev Schreiber and Dan Hedaya.(n)

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More
programme.desc: An enigmatic gunslinger forms an uneasy alliance with a military veteran to track down a notorious outlaw - but tensions simmer as their very different motives for the hunt put them increasingly at odds. Sergio Leone's Western sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volonte, Josef Egger, Mara Krup and Klaus Kinski.(n)

programme.title: East of Eden
programme.desc: The son of a farmer struggles to cope with his father disregarding him in favour of his brother, as well as the revelation that his supposedly dead mother is alive and running a brothel. America's coming involvement in the First World War gives him an idea for a business venture that he hopes will earn the old man's respect. Drama based on John Steinbeck's novel, starring James Dean and Raymond Massey.(n)

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: A detective is sent to Alaska to investigate a murder during a month when the sun does not set. Sleep deprivation starts to take its toll, and he accidentally shoots his partner dead. He tries to cover it up, but the criminal they were hunting has seen everything and blackmails the cop into helping him escape justice. Thriller directed by Christopher Nolan, starring Al Pacino, Robin Williams and Hilary Swank.(n)

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: A computer hacker is released from prison after being convicted of committing cyber crimes. He's immediately enlisted by the FBI when they discover that one of his software codes is being used as part of a terrorist plot. Crime drama, starring Chris Hemsworth, Leehom Wang and Viola Davis.(n)

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager relishes her newfound freedom when her mother goes missing, seizing the opportunity to flirt with the boy next door and a cop on the case. Over time, she begins to realise what she has lost and finds the unexplained details of the disappearance haunting her. Mystery based on Laura Kasischke's novel, starring Shailene Woodley and Eva Green.(n)

programme.title: Wild at Heart
programme.desc: An Elvis-obsessed ex-con and his lover set off on a nightmarish journey across America pursued by a variety of bizarre and deadly characters. David Lynch's dark road movie, starring Nicolas Cage, Laura Dern, Diane Ladd, Willem Dafoe, Harry Dean Stanton and Isabella Rossellini.(n)

programme.title: Splice
programme.desc: Two scientists hope to create new creatures for medical purposes by combining DNA from various animals. When their funding is stopped, they secretly create a new creature incorporating human DNA. However, they soon realise they cannot control it, while the relationship between the being and its creators turns dangerous. Sci-fi horror, starring Adrien Brody, Sarah Polley and Delphine Chaneac.

programme.title: Magic in the Water
programme.desc: Two children investigate the legend of a mythical creature rumoured to live in the lake by their holiday home. They are astonished when they discover the monster and find it is actually quite friendly - and is eager to help the children thwart a company dumping toxic waste in the water. Family adventure, starring Mark Harmon, Joshua Jackson and Harley Jane Kozak.

programme.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
programme.desc: An admiral takes charge of an experimental submarine just as the world is plunged into catastrophe. A belt of radiation surrounding the planet has ignited, threatening all life on Earth. The admiral believes he can end the crisis with a well-aimed nuclear missile, but faces an uphill struggle to convince high command that his plan will not lead to more destruction. Sci-fi adventure, with Walter Pidgeon, Joan Fontaine and Robert Sterling.

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
programme.desc: Weedy youngster Greg finds his plans for a lazy school holiday ruined when his mother bans video games and his father organises a series of family activities. When he finds out a girl he likes is working at a country club, he tells his family he has a summer job there as an excuse to spend time with her - but struggles to keep up the deception. Family comedy sequel, starring Zachary Gordon and Steve Zahn.

programme.title: Cheaper By the Dozen
programme.desc: A large family moves to a new town, hoping for a fresh start - but nothing goes according to plan, and the unlucky dad ends up in charge of his 12 rowdy children while his wife goes on a promotional book tour. Remake of the 1950 comedy, starring Steve Martin, Bonnie Hunt, Piper Perabo, Tom Welling and Hilary Duff.

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: A fugitive's girlfriend is being watched by the police while travelling from Paris to Venice. She seduces an unsuspecting American tourist to make them think he is her lover with his appearance altered by plastic surgery, leaving the baffled holidaymaker pursued across Europe by the cops and rival gangsters. Romantic thriller, with Johnny Depp, Angelina Jolie and Paul Bettany.

programme.title: Paul
programme.desc: An alien held captive in a top-secret American military base escapes and hides out in the van of two English comic-book geeks on a tour of UFO hotspots. The wisecracking extraterrestrial enlists the duo's help in getting back to his spaceship, but they are soon pursued by government agents and unwittingly become kidnappers. Sci-fi comedy, starring Simon Pegg and Nick Frost, with the voice of Seth Rogen.

programme.title: The Running Man
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot is framed for the murder of starving civilians - and ends up being forced to take part in a brutal TV game show in which a succession of gadget-wielding killers hunt him on the streets of Los Angeles. Sci-fi action adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Yaphet Kotto, Maria Conchita Alonso and Richard Dawson.

programme.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
programme.desc: A disgraced journalist and a troubled computer hacker are hired by a member of a wealthy family whose niece disappeared 40 years ago. He is convinced she was murdered by one of his own relatives, and wants them to find the evidence - but the family will go to any lengths to conceal their secrets. Mystery thriller based on Stieg Larsson's novel, with Michael Nyqvist and Noomi Rapace. In Swedish and English.(n)

programme.title: The Harry Hill Movie
programme.desc: The quirky comedian is tricked into thinking his hamster has only one week to live, so he and his nan decide to grant the pet's dying wish of a holiday in Blackpool. However, they do not realise they have fallen into a trap set by Harry's evil twin brother. Comedy, starring Harry Hill, Julie Walters, Matt Lucas and Sheridan Smith.(n)

programme.title: Run Wild, Run Free
programme.desc: Withdrawn, mute 10-year-old Philip is ignored by his parents and goes off to explore Dartmoor alone, where he meets a retired colonel who shares his knowledge of Devon's wildlife. Under the older man's nurturing tutelage, the boy begins to tame a wild white colt, but fate proffers a series of setbacks just as real progress is being made. Children's drama, starring John Mills, Mark Lester, Sylvia Syms and Bernard Miles.(n)

programme.title: Ramona and Beezus
programme.desc: Nine-year-old Ramona has a vivid imagination and an unfortunate habit of accidentally causing trouble for herself and everyone else. When her father is fired from his job, the family's lives are thrown into upheaval, and Ramona puts her mind to the task of making sure they do not lose their home. Comedy based on Beverly Cleary's series of books, starring Joey King and Selena Gomez.(n)

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: A workaholic father tries to make up for his perpetual absence from home by promising to buy his son a hugely popular action figure for Christmas - little realising every other father in town has the same idea. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sinbad, Jake Lloyd, Rita Wilson, Robert Conrad and Phil Hartman.(n)

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc: A father-of-two struggling to cope with the death of his wife is in need of a fresh start, so buys a house with a dilapidated zoo on the grounds. With the help of the keepers, he works to restore the attraction to its former glory, while also trying to reconnect with his troubled teenage son. Fact-based comedy drama, starring Matt Damon, Scarlett Johansson and Thomas Haden Church.(n)

programme.title: Blood Ties
programme.desc: Premiere. A police officer in 1970s New York takes in his older brother following his release from prison. The cop tries to help his sibling make a fresh start, finding honest work and reconnecting with the family he lost - but conflict erupts as the elder brother returns to a life of crime. Crime drama, starring Clive Owen, Billy Crudup, Marion Cotillard and James Caan.(n)

programme.title: Goon
programme.desc: An underachieving bouncer is the black sheep of a family of doctors, until he beats an ice hockey player in a fight, and is recruited by the team. While he has little sporting prowess, his ability to beat up opposing players leads him to a successful career - and a showdown with his equally violent hero. Comedy, starring Seann William Scott, Jay Baruchel and Liev Schreiber.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben hatches a money-making scheme his father does not approve of, while Yancy trains to become a barber.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The family takes in an old friend of John Boy's who has been serving in the war, but is now in a wheelchair as a result of his injuries.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura and Grace are frustrated that the boys they want to take them to the spring dance are showing no interest, so decide to make them jealous.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. A widow realises she does not have long to live, so asks Charles to find homes for her three children.

programme.title: The Road from Coorain
programme.desc: Biopic of Australian feminist writer Jill Ker Conway, charting her upbringing in a farming community and early experience of the academic world. Starring Juliet Stevenson and Richard Roxburgh.

programme.title: Sleeping Dogs Lie
programme.desc: Popular and successful theatre impresario Ambrose Small unexpectedly sells his empire and disappears without a trace, leaving his friends and family baffled. Mystery, set in 1919, starring Wendy Crewson and Art Hindle.

programme.title: Wicked Love
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a woman found in a car boot after an attempt on her life that leaves her in a coma. As her unfaithful husband and his mistress stand trial, a controversy erupts over whether her life support should be switched off. Starring Rebecca Gibney, Vince Colosimo and Maya Stange.

programme.title: DC 9/11: Time of Crisis
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, as people across America attempted to come to terms with the tragedy, focusing on the reaction of President George W Bush and the advice given by his many advisors. Timothy Bottoms, John Cunningham, Andrew Gillies, Penny Johnson and Doug Lennox star.

programme.title: A Christmas Reunion
programme.desc: An orphan yearns to be closer to his ageing grandfather, and his wish is granted after a visit to Santa Claus reveals a few home truths. Drama, with Edward Woodward, James Coburn and Meredith Edwards.

programme.title: Miracle of the Heart
programme.desc: After losing a patient in surgery, doctor Nathan Andrews takes a break from his career and returns to his small town roots. A chance encounter with an old acquaintance offers him a promise for the future, only for a tragedy to call into question everything he believes. Drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Rebecca Gayheart and Rob Lowe.

programme.title: On the Second Day of Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her niece are caught stealing just before Christmas, and face the prospect of spending the festive season in the care of social services - until a kindly shop worker volunteers to put them up. Romantic drama, starring Mary Stuart Masterson and Mark Ruffalo.

programme.title: With Savage Intent
programme.desc: An estate agent sets out to track down the mystery assailants who shot and left her for dead at an empty property - only to realise they are men of influence whose prestige will make them hard to convict. Thriller, starring Elizabeth Montgomery, Robert Foxworth, Howard Rollins and Ronny Cox.

programme.title: Deacons for Defence
programme.desc: A black man is pushed too far by the racist abuse and unprovoked violent assaults meted out by white bigots in the 1960s, and organises a defence group to fight back. Fact-based drama, starring Forest Whitaker, Adam Weiner, Jonathan Silverman and Serene Lee.

programme.title: Murder in a College Town
programme.desc: Mother-of-two Rose Earl proudly sends her eldest son off to college, only for him to be led into a life of crime by his dastardly roommate. When he subsequently disappears without trace, Rose embarks on a desperate search to discover what has become of him. Drama, starring Kate Jackson, Drew Ebersole and Matthew Settle.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia thinks John works too hard and tries to persuade him to take some time off, but then receives disturbing news about her own health.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A stroke of luck saves Jim Bob from certain disaster, and prompts a major change in his outlook on life.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. Charles has a difficult time trying to find someone who will adopt all three Sanderson children. It looks as if the children will get split up, and while they try to be brave, Alicia breaks down at the thought of leaving her brothers and Grace Snider. At the very last moment, Mr Edwards makes a monumental decision.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Ingalls and Oleson families settle their differences when they go camping together.(n)

programme.title: Moonlight & Mistletoe
programme.desc: A businesswoman returns home to help out her Dad's business Santaland after he suffers an injury. Despite her initial reluctance, she soon comes to appreciate the family trade. Drama, starring Candace Cameron Bure, Tom Arnold, Christopher Wiehl and Barbara Niven.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Palomino
programme.desc: A photographer, struggling to overcome the break-up of her marriage by going to live on a friend's California ranch, where her riding skills impress the ranch hands - one of whom she embarks on a passionate affair with. However, her life takes a turn for the worse when her new lover is unable to cope with the class difference between them and an accident leaves her paralysed. Drama, starring Lee Horsley, Lindsay Frost, Eva Marie Saint and Rod Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Wife, Mother, Murderer
programme.desc: A woman desperate to escape her small town roots murders her husband, attempts to poison her child and assumes multiple fake identities, even going so far as to fake the death of one of her aliases and take on the guise of her own identical twin sister. Fact-based drama, starring Judith Light and David Ogden Stiers.(n)

programme.title: Video Voyeur: The Susan Wilson Story
programme.desc: A woman is understandably horrified to discover her apparently kind-hearted neighbour has somehow managed to install state-of-the-art surveillance equipment throughout her home, so he can spy on her and her family. Fact-based drama, starring Angie Harmon, Jamey Sheridan and Dale Midkiff.(n)

programme.title: Our Gift of Love
programme.desc: A freak accident leaves a man in a coma shortly before Christmas. While friends and family urge his wife to prepare for the worst, she refuses to accept he will not recover and dedicates herself to taking care of him. Drama, starring Rebecca De Mornay, Henry Czerny, Barclay Hope and Lila Yee.(n)

programme.title: Christmas in Canaan
programme.desc: Two boys, one black and the other white, grow up in a racially divided Texas community in the 1960s. The pair take an instant dislike to each other, but their families are determined to end the conflict by forcing them to spend time together. The youngsters grow to become firm friends, but the tension among their neighbours is harder to resolve. Drama, with Jaishon Fisher and Zak Ludwig.(n)

programme.title: The Night They Saved Christmas
programme.desc: Santa's North Pole home is threatened when an oil company plans to drill in the vicinity, but the wife and son of a company employee are enlisted to help save the toy-making village from destruction. Festive fantasy, starring Art Carney, Jaclyn Smith, Paul Le Mat and Mason Adams.(n)

programme.title: God Bless the Child
programme.desc: Poverty and hardship force a single mother and her seven-year-old daughter to move into a shelter for the homeless. Drama, starring Mare Winningham, Grace Johnston and Dorian Harewood.(n)

programme.title: To Live For
programme.desc: A terminally ill woman's last months are made happier by her relationship with a stranger she hopes will take care of her children. Romantic drama, starring Nancy Travis, Scott Bairstow, Jamie Renee Smith, Karen James and Viveka Davis.(n)

programme.title: The Glass House
programme.desc: A former college professor launches a campaign for prison reforms while serving time in a harsh maximum security jail for manslaughter. Drama based on a short story by Truman Capote, starring Alan Alda, Vic Morrow, Dean Jagger and Billy Dee Williams.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan comes to the aid of a widow whose son is dying and a young runaway, while Mark helps a thief who has been abandoned by his family.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Masked Rider.
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark persuade an ageing movie star to be a real-life hero by standing up to a street gang, and also help a boxer who is being pressured into throwing a fight.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.sub-title: The Guns of Cibola Blanca - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Confederate Civil War veterans become bank robbers, disguising themselves as Union soldiers to discredit their old enemies.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.sub-title: The Guns of Cibola Blanca - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. A search is organised for Doc when his stagecoach arrives without its passengers.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica is faced with the challenge of helping a well-known journalist with a drink problem. Drama, starring Roma Downey and Della Reese.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica meets an enthusiastic boater with a shady past, but the encounter puts her fear of water to the test.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia embarks on a one-woman strike, prompting John to take her on a belated honeymoon after 19 years of marriage.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Charlie Harmon throws John a financial lifeline by offering him £5,000 for Walton's Mountain, but the deal comes with strings attached. Noah Beery guest stars.

programme.title: Sharing the Secret
programme.desc: A teenager struggles with bulimia, while her psychologist mother deals with her guilt at not recognising the signs of an eating disorder. Drama, starring Alison Lohman, Mare Winningham and Roxana Brusso.

programme.title: A Killing in a Small Town
programme.desc: A Sunday school teacher looking for excitement embarks on an affair with a church-going man, leading to a fatal confrontation with his wife - but as the case goes to trial, she realises the odds are stacked against a jury accepting her plea of self-defence. Fact-based drama, starring Barbara Hershey, Brian Dennehy, John Terry and Lee Garlington.

programme.title: Mistaken Identity
programme.desc: A mix-up in a maternity ward results in two new mothers unwittingly taking home the wrong babies - leaving them to face a terrible dilemma once the truth comes to light. Drama based on a true story, starring Melissa Gilbert, Rosanna Arquette, David Andrews and James McCaffrey.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. The family mourns Grandpa's death and celebrates his life, while Mary Ellen and Erin become roommates in Charlottesville.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Sarah Carter's father causes problems when he arrives in Walnut Grove and tries to persuade his family to give up the simple life and enjoy a luxurious existence in New York.

programme.title: Calendar Girl Murders
programme.desc: A detective is sent to investigate when the stars of a new raunchy calendar are murdered one at a time. He faces a race against time to find the killer before more blood is shed. Thriller, starring Tom Skerritt and Sharon Stone.

programme.title: Escape from Terror: The Teresa Stamper Story
programme.desc: A woman falls in love with the man she believes is Mr Right and hastily marries him, but it isn't long before he begins showing his true colours, forcing her to seek shelter at a safe house. Fact-based drama, starring Maria Pitillo, Adam Storke and Brad Dourif.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu
programme.desc: Concluding instalment of the drama based on the rise of the gifted Zulu leader during the turbulent 19th century. Driven by an ancient tribal prophecy, Shaka united several tribes into a bold new nation. Starring Henry Cele. Last in the series.

programme.title: Murder of Innocence
programme.desc: A woman's descent into insanity is witnessed by her confused and alienated husband as he battles the authorities to prove she is a danger to society. Drama, starring Valerie Bertinelli and Stephen Caffrey.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark visit a country and western bar, where they meet a woman who longs to become a singer like her mother and help a dysfunctional family to stay together.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: One Fresh Batch of Lemonade - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. An athlete feels his life is worthless when he loses his legs in a motorcycle accident, so Jonathan steps in to show him what he can still achieve.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Two drovers find they are unable to compete with the railroad and are forced to turn to crime.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A farmer insists his three sons get married, so they kidnap a trio of saloon girls to be their brides. Guest starring Harry Morgan (MASH) and William Katt (Carrie).(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica helps a teenager who runs away with the child she promised to give up for adoption. Drama about an angel sent to Earth to help solve people's problems. Roma Downey and Della Reese star.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Charles is fearful of an imagined heart condition, but Robin may be the cure to his heart problems. Roma Downey stars.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandpa offers a few words of wisdom to Jason, who has just discovered a close friend has been diagnosed as suffering from a terminal illness. Ron Howard guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia surprises her family by announcing she is going to earn extra money as a door-to-door saleswoman.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Daddy
programme.desc: An advertising executive's wife walks out, leaving him to raise their children alone - a problem compounded by his mother's death in a car accident. Drama, starring Patrick Duffy, Lynda Carter, Kate Mulgrew and featuring an early appearance by Ben Affleck.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's No Greater Love
programme.desc: A woman endures a seemingly endless series of personal trials and traumas after her parents are killed on the Titanic, but carries on struggling to keep her family together. Period drama, starring Kelly Rutherford, Chris Sarandon, Simon MacCorkindale and Michael Landes.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Fine Things
programme.desc: A man marries the woman of his dreams, only to see her die of cancer - and while coping with the pain of bereavement, he finds himself subjected to extortionate demands from her drug-dealing ex-husband. Drama, starring DW Moffett, Tracy Pollan and Cloris Leachman.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob falls in love with the Baldwin family's cousin, who is preparing to become a nun. Ben hires an unreliable new employee at the mill.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Isaiah Edwards is mistakenly identified as part of an outlaw gang when the infamous Younger brothers are released from prison and set about rebuilding their reputation.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Star
programme.desc: A woman dreams of escaping the drudgery of everyday life and becoming a successful singer. A romance with a handsome stranger offers her hope - but the lovebirds are soon separated, and her spirits take another battering. Romantic drama, starring Jennie Garth, Craig Bierko, Terry Farrell and Ted Wass.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Vanished
programme.desc: A devoted mother's son is kidnapped, and as the FBI search widens, she is distressed to find herself suspected of involvement in the crime, along with a former lover who may not be what he seems. Drama set in the 1930s, starring Lisa Rinna, George Hamilton and Robert Hays.(n)

programme.title: Princess Diana: In Search of Happiness
programme.desc: A review of the life of Diana, Princess of Wales, including her childhood, her move into the public eye, her work for charity, her marriage and her death.(n)

programme.title: Dangerous Indiscretions
programme.desc: Kate Ricketts narrates a documentary examining the British monarchy in the aftermath of the death of Diana, Princess of Wales, and the Windsor family's assorted feuds and divorces. Featuring archive footage of Prince Charles, Sarah Ferguson and Camilla Parker-Bowles.(n)

programme.title: Deacons for Defence
programme.desc: A black man is pushed too far by the racist abuse and unprovoked violent assaults meted out by white bigots in the 1960s, and organises a defence group to fight back. Fact-based drama, starring Forest Whitaker, Adam Weiner, Jonathan Silverman and Serene Lee.(n)

programme.title: Roadies
programme.desc: Longest Days. Janine shakes things up with the band and crew; Wes treats Winston to a guitar lesson from a rock legend

programme.title: The Best Man
programme.desc: A guy tries to help his best friend win the attention of the girl of his dreams

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: Craig Brewer's two-handed drama begins after Rae's soldier husband is called up for duty in Iraq. She goes off the rails, sleeping around until one encounter leaves her semi-naked in the road, where she's found by Lazarus, who's nursing his own hurt of a cheating wife. Determined to save Rae from herself, he initially imprisons her in his home but, as the two form a relationship, so she begins to understand the reasons behind her actions

programme.title: Off-Air
programme.desc: Off-Air

programme.title: Miles to Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: The relationships between musicians and their road crews, and their importance, are explored

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: Curtis Hanson ( LA Confidential ) came up trumps again with this Oscar-nominated comedy drama. College professor Michael Douglas is having writer's block on his follow-up to his acclaimed first novel, his affair with married chancellor Frances McDormand has resulted in her pregnancy and student Katie Holmes, boarding at his home, is getting a crush on him... Douglas, playing the cardigan-clad shaggy professor bemused at what life has thrown at him is superb and the supporting cast of Tobey Maguire, Robert Downey Jnr and Rip Torn all add to this genuine gem of a movie

programme.title: Freedom Writers
programme.desc: Assigned the thankless task of teaching freshman English at a gang-infested Long Beach, CA high school, a 23-year-old teacher resorts to unconventional means of breaking through to her hardened students in director Richard LaGravenese's adaptation of Erin Gruwell's best-seller The Freedom Writer's Diaries: How a Teacher and 150 Teens Used Writing to Change Themselves and the World Around Them. Her students had been written off, and her chances of succeeding scoffed at, but Erin Gruwell (Hilary Swank) wasn't about to go down without a fight. Long Beach is a place where a new war is waged with each passing day, and when the hardened students who walk those dangerous hallways sense an outsider attempting to understand their plight, their cynical resentment threatens to keep a deadly cycle in motion. Despite the initially hostile reaction she receives in the classroom, Gruwell uses the writings of Anne Frank and Zlata's Diary: A Child's Life in Sarajevo to teach her students not only the basis of the English language, but compassion and tolerance as well. Later, when the time comes to tell their own tales in a project specially designed to explore the daily violence that the majority of students have grown numb to, the barriers that had once stood so strong gradually begin to crumble. When the only chance for survival is to befriend the person who was once your mortal enemy, the world is opened to a whole new realm of possibilities

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: An American soldier becomes involved in an illegal Hong Kong kickboxing competition, where combatants fight to the death for the world championship. This extremely violent, low-budget action drama was reportedly based on the true story of martial arts champ Frank Dux

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: Rival werewolves battle for a half-blood boy. One group wants to end the curse, but the other already has the taste for blood

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: World-weary criminal profiler Alex Cross is challenged to a nasty game when a senator's daughter is kidnapped. Cross is still bruised from his last assignment, but he needs his wits about him... this case is not as it seems. A polished thriller

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: Docudrama about a 1971 psychological experiment in which 24 male undergrads at Stanford were asked to role-play as guards and inmates in a mock prison setting

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: Director Jonathan Demme and star Denzel Washington team together for the first time since 1993's critically acclaimed Philadelphia in this remake of the 1962 political thriller The Manchurian Candidate, which was based on the novel of the same name by Richard Condon and featured Frank Sinatra in the lead role. Washington plays Bennett Marco, a soldier who, along with Raymond Shaw (Liev Schreiber) and the rest of their platoon, is kidnapped by the enemy during the first Gulf War. Back home years later, as Shaw rises to political prominence, Marco begins to remember that they had been brainwashed by their captors, programmed to carry out the wishes of terrorists when triggered by a specific phrase. The Manchurian Candidate also stars Meryl Streep, Miguel Ferrer, and Jon Voight

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Two hitmen investigate a cocaine deal that went wrong, a boxer ordered to take a fall ponders the double-cross, while a mobster's girl takes an overdose after a night dancing. Multiple tales of LA's gangland underworld, interlinked with stunning confidence and backed by a supercool surf soundtrack. One of the most influential movies of the 90s

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: World-weary criminal profiler Alex Cross is challenged to a nasty game when a senator's daughter is kidnapped. Cross is still bruised from his last assignment, but he needs his wits about him... this case is not as it seems. A polished thriller

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: Kyle Patrick Alvarez's drama The Stanford Prison Experiment is based on real events. Dr. Philip Zimbardo (Billy Cruddup) arranges for 24 volunteers to be either guards or inmates a makeshift prison system so that he can observe how their behavior changes. Eventually those playing guards become abusive and dictatorial, while the inmates band together to survive the harsh conditions. What the Stanford professor doesn't expect is that he and the people running the experiment are also being transformed by taking part in it. The Stanford Prison Experiment screened at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Match
programme.desc: An aging Juilliard dance teacher must face his painful past during an interview with a grad student. Ultimately, the talk could lead to healing or despair for the interviewer's emotionally damaged husband(n)

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: A young detective working undercover at an elite private school discovers the students are operating an international stolen car ring(n)

programme.title: Passion of Mind
programme.desc: Demi Moore stars in this unusual psychological drama about two women caught between reality and imagination. Marie (Moore) is an American widow trying to raise two children under difficult circumstances in a small town in France. Marty (also played by Moore) is a successful businesswoman in New York City who wants to leave her busy life and lead a quieter existence in Europe. But Marty is just a product of Marie's imagination -- or at least that's what Marie thinks. Marty, on the other hand, is convinced that Marie is just someone she dreamed up. Who is right? Or are both of them wrong? And where does it leave the men in their lives (Stellan Skarsgard and William Fichtner)? Passion of Mind was the first English-language film from French director Alain Berliner, best known for the arthouse success Ma Vie en Rose(n)

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: A food critic and his obnoxious best friend tour the English countryside in order to review several restaurants(n)

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: Comedy drama about a family's snowy day. Dad is a TV weatherman who tries vainly to get people to listen to his predictions, Mum is a stressed businesswoman without childcare for her toddler, and their eldest son is obsessed by the prettiest girl in the school. But school is closed and his ten-year-old sister decides to sabotage the snowplough and extend the fun for another day(n)

programme.title: Why Did I Get Married?
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote, produced, directed and stars in this touching and insightful comedy-drama that he adapted from his successful stage play. Four close couples hash out a variety of relationship issues while on vacation in the Colorado mountains, where a marital blizzard blows in when one of them arrives sans wife but with mistress in tow(n)

programme.title: The Dramatics
programme.desc: When an actress lands a sexually explicit role, her unhappy boyfriend must either accept it or risk losing her(n)

programme.title: Frank & Jesse
programme.desc: Rob Lowe and Bill Paxton star as Frank and Jesse James, who, after the defeat of the South in the Civil War and the pointless murder of their younger brother, seek their own brand of justice. As outlaws, they gain fame for their daring hold-ups of banks, trains, and stagecoaches -- and make sworn enemies of lawmen, who are determined to see them dead(n)

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Profiling DJ AM (aka Adam Goldstein), a hugely successful and influential disc jockey known for his mash-ups of popular songs. The film traces the course of his life as he found fame and fought to remain sober, only to relapse and die of a drug overdose at the age of 36 following the trauma of surviving a plane crash(n)

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Fish and Bird. Ray waits to see if Belikov will be released from prison and struggles with the prospect of putting a pimp back out on the street. Later, Art dealer Sonia Kovitsky invites Ray to a breast cancer benefit where he encounters some former clients and becomes more entrenched in her operation. Meanwhile, Teresa spirals into a postpartum depression; and Mickey tries to persuade the DA that he was the sole architect behind the Minassian massacre(n)

programme.title: Why Did I Get Married?
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote, produced, directed and stars in this touching and insightful comedy-drama that he adapted from his successful stage play. Four close couples hash out a variety of relationship issues while on vacation in the Colorado mountains, where a marital blizzard blows in when one of them arrives sans wife but with mistress in tow(n)

programme.title: Roadies
programme.desc: Longest Days. Janine shakes things up with the band and crew; Wes treats Winston to a guitar lesson from a rock legend(n)

programme.title: Let Us Prey
programme.desc: Rachel is a rookie cop ready to begin her first night shift in the local police station of small Scottish, backwater town. However, this is a night she will never forget; for when Six arrives...all hell will break loose, with Rachel caught right in the centre of it

programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Scientists perform paranormal experiments on a woman, and strive to weaponize the evil within her. But the otherworldly power proves stronger than anyone anticipated, prompting a shocking series of events that the government tries to cover up

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A Russian Special Forces soldier must escape from a mysterious island where people are harvested for their organs and continue on her quest to rescue her sister

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: A modern-day marine biologist (Josh Hartnett) slips into a coma, taking him on an epic journey through time while exploring his undying love for a woman that spanned four centuries. As he fights for his life on a hospital bed, his journey through the First Anglo-Maratha War becomes interwoven through passion and love

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: A group of campers hunker down in a medieval Turkish town and play a mysterious party game that quickly escalates into something far more sinister

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A London orphan named Molly Moon studies hypnosis, and uses her powers to escape from her orphanage and search for a friend who was adopted. However, she is soon distracted by the thought of becoming a movie star via mesmerism, as well as by a thief who wants her help with a heist

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: In this haunting thriller, a supernatural being torments a family one year after the death of their daughter

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: A banished warrior and a reclusive wizard team up to defend the Celtic people from an invasion by the Saxons in this epic adventure

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A teenage werewolf runs away after his parents are slaughtered, and ends up in a colony of lycanthropes

programme.title: Blood and Sand
programme.desc: Previously filmed in 1922 with Rudolph Valentino and in 1940 with Tyrone Power, Vicente Blasco Ibanez's mystical bullfight novel Blood & Sand was given a third big-screen treatment in 1989. Though filmed in Spain by a Spanish director, the 1989 Blood & Sand casts American actor Christopher Rydell as the bullfighter hero. Also hailing from the USA is a pre-Basic Instinct Sharon Stone, playing the vamp role previously essayed in 1922 by Nita Naldi and in 1940 by Rita Hayworth. The story remains the same: a dirt-poor youth rises to fame and fortune in the bull ring, forgets his roots, cheats on his wife, has a last-minute change of heart, and pays for his sins in grotesque fashion

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Wrestling superstar "Stone Cold" Steve Austin packs a wallop in this action-packed adventure. He plays Jack Conrad, a convicted murderer who's purchased from a Central American prison and sent to battle nine other killers in a made-for-TV death match that is being broadcast as part of a reality-television extravaganza. Former European soccer star Vinnie Jones costars as McStarley, a sociopathic former Special Forces operative. Directed by Scott Wiper, who co-wrote the script

programme.title: Angels of Darkness
programme.desc: In this Italian melodrama, three Roman prostitutes suddenly find themselves on the streets when the city informs them that their brothel is to be destroyed. The story chronicles what happens to each of them

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: Though not officially acknowleged at the time of its telecast, the made-for-TV movie The Last Survivors was a rehash of the 1957 theatrical feature Abandon Ship; both in fact were based on the same true story. A typhoon at sea has sunk a ship, leaving Alexander Holmes (Martin Sheen) as the highest ranking officer to survive. Commandeering a crowded lifeboat, Holmes must face the fact that the tiny vessel is in danger of floundering itself--and there's another typhoon on the way. Thus is Holmes forced to "play God", decided who among the passengers will allowed to remain in the lifeboat, and who will be cast overboard. Broadcast by NBC, The Last Survivors debuted on March 4, 1975. ~Saw Film/TV Guide/Marrill/Internet/Expert

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A teenage werewolf runs away after his parents are slaughtered, and ends up in a colony of lycanthropes

programme.title: Heartless
programme.desc: A young photographer with a huge, red heart-shaped birthmark on his face learns that reptilian monsters are posing as street gangs in London. Their leader offers to remove his facial disfigurement in return for performing some evil deeds

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A man unfairly convicted of murder is bought by a TV producer and stranded on an island with a group of killers. The sole survivor will be granted freedom(n)

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: An officer mulls sacrificing passengers on an overcrowded lifeboat in order to prevent the vessel from foundering(n)

programme.title: Blood and Sand
programme.desc: Version of Ibanez's oft-told tale about the romantic entanglements of a bullfighter. Filmed on location in Madrid, Jerez and Sevilla, Spain(n)

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a movie-theater cashier believes he's the son of God, and is accosted by a ghost who claims to dwell in limbo. This forces him to rethink his place in the universe, and soon he believes the ghost can help him understand his fate(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: Recently orphaned teen Isabel (Sarah Desjardins) finds a sympathetic friend in a stray terrier, but soon it's revealed that her canine pal is actually an experimental android with enhanced strength and speed, x-ray vision, and the power of speech. Now teen and dog must work together to defeat an encroaching burger franchise and evade an interloper eager to snatch the robot pup(n)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the mysterious disappearance of two archeologists who retrieve fairy-tale objects, it's up to their teenage sons to step up and save the day(n)

programme.title: Nightlight
programme.desc: In this innovative thriller, teens playing a spooky flashlight game in haunted woods at night get more than they bargained when a demon is awakened by their shenanigans(n)

programme.title: Willow Creek
programme.desc: A couple on the hunt for Bigfoot get more than they bargained for when they go deep into the woods to the location of a fabled sighting(n)

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Big-budget action fantasy about the battle for survival in a world where dry land has disappeared with the melting of the polar ice caps. One man, who has become amphibious, tries to protect survivors on an artificial atoll made from scrap metal by taking on a gang of marauding pirates. He is also intent on discovering if there is any truth in the myth that there is still some land left above water(n)

programme.title: Frequencies
programme.desc: This philosophical love story follows the relationship between a boy and a girl upon their meeting in a strange reality where human interaction has been redefined(n)

programme.title: Jamie Marks Is Dead
programme.desc: The ghost of a young loner haunts a high school track star who never knew him in life. Later, the popular athlete flees his troubled home, and has a terrifying encounter with a malevolent spirit whose motivations appear to be much darker(n)

programme.title: Catch Hell
programme.desc: Two men kidnap a has-been Hollywood star (Ryan Phillipe) in Louisiana, and submit him to inhuman torture a secluded shack. Upon discovering his abductors' true motivation, the terrified actor fights to escape and avoid being killed(n)

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: In the wake of sleeping with a handsome stranger, a young woman quickly learns that she has inherited a most unusual curse: wherever she goes, lumbering, half-naked phantoms follow, and their singular goal is to see her dead(n)

programme.title: Willow Creek
programme.desc: A couple on the hunt for Bigfoot get more than they bargained for when they go deep into the woods to the location of a fabled sighting(n)

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: Rival werewolves battle for a half-blood boy. One group wants to end the curse, but the other already has the taste for blood

programme.title: Wrong Side of Town
programme.desc: After accidentally killing a club owner in a fight, ex-Navy seal Bobby Kalinowsky must fight for his life when the dead man's gangster brother puts a price on his head. Action

programme.title: Heatstroke
programme.desc: A research scientist, his girlfriend, and his teenage daughter fight for their lives in the African desert after incurring the wrath of ruthless arms dealers. When the father is brutally murdered, his girlfriend and daughter wage a harrowing struggle for survival

programme.title: Passion of Mind
programme.desc: Demi Moore sinks her teeth into dual roles in this romantic fantasy. She plays Marty, a successful but stressed-out New York career woman. In her dreams, she's transported to Southern France, where she is Marie, living a kinder, gentler bohemian life. Stellan Skarsgard, William Fichtner, Sinead Cusack, Peter Rigert

programme.title: Hit Me
programme.desc: A suicidal man (Christian Svensson) whose wife left him and took their child wants to cancel the hit he purchased on himself. Morocco Omari. Directed by Steven Minor

programme.title: Frequencies
programme.desc: In a fantastical alternate universe, only people with the same innate frequency can be together. Despite this, a young man falls for a woman with a different frequency, and must defy the very rules of reality for his love

programme.title: American Loser
programme.desc: An aimless slacker runs out of options when he gets kicked out of his home, but he soon moves in with a woman whom he met at a support group for people with relationship problems. Eventually, she inspires him to get his life together

programme.title: Inside Comedy
programme.desc: Chris Rock. Chris Rock is the guest

programme.title: Fido
programme.desc: In a 1950s-era alternate universe where domesticated zombies play a functional role in society by delivering the milk, carrying the mail, and even helping out with household chores, one boy is about to find out just how big of a personal responsibility "pet" ownership truly is. When the Earth passed through a cloud of space dust and the dead arose from their graves to devour the flesh of the living, it first seemed that all hope for humanity was lost. Society's rapid slide into chaos, however, was soon halted when scientists at a company called ZomCom created a special collar that turned the rampaging animated corpses docile. Now, thanks to ZomCom, everything is under control -- or is it? Timmy Robinson (K'Sun Ray) isn't quite convinced. Quiet and withdrawn, the skeptical young boy spends so much time locked away in his room that he's almost become invisible around the household. His mother Helen (Carrie-Anne Moss) has recently purchased a zombie to help keep things tidy around the house though, and when the creature attempts to engage the curious youngster in a game of catch, a friendship is forged between boy and zombie that finds the amiable gut-muncher nicknamed Fido (Billy Connolly) practically becoming a part of the family. Things take a turn for the worse however, when Fido's collar malfunctions and Timmy's neighbors begin dying in droves. When ZomCom's top zombie control specialist Mr. Bottoms (Henry Czerny) moves in across the street from Timmy, the increasingly complicated situation threatens to place a serious stumbling block in the path of human-zombie relations

programme.title: Beautiful Girls
programme.desc: Comedy drama about a group of men who get together for a high-school reunion in snowy New England. During the course of the weekend they chew over life, sports and women before one of them takes the plunge and gets married

programme.title: Safelight
programme.desc: A teenage boy (Evan Peters) and a young prostitute (Juno Temple) take a road trip up the California coast to photograph lighthouses. However, her abusive pimp could cause the journey to end in violence in this gritty drama from writer/director Tony Aloupis

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars in Sofia Coppola's Oscar-winning romantic comedy-drama as over-the-hill actor Bob Harris, who is lured to Tokyo to 'act' in a whisky commercial in return for big money. In the hotel bar he bumps into Charlotte who has been left to her own devices while her husband, a successful photographer, is on an assignment. Two strangers in an unfamiliar city, they form a friendship that slips into tenderness as they recognise each other's vulnerability. By turn comic and touching, the duo turn in pitch-perfect performances

programme.title: Frequencies
programme.desc: In a fantastical alternate universe, only people with the same innate frequency can be together. Despite this, a young man falls for a woman with a different frequency, and must defy the very rules of reality for his love

programme.title: Beautiful Girls
programme.desc: Comedy drama about a group of men who get together for a high-school reunion in snowy New England. During the course of the weekend they chew over life, sports and women before one of them takes the plunge and gets married

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: A moody memory piece about five doomed teenage sisters in 1970s suburbia

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: In this horror film a demon lumberjack terrorizes the staff of Good Friends church camp as they prepare for spring break. Directed by Josh Bear. Cast includes Michael Madsen, Adam Sessler, Brina Palencia and Christopher Sabat

programme.title: Summer of Blood
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic urbanite rejects a marriage proposal from his career-oriented girlfriend, and finds his self-confidence eroded following a series of disastrous dates. Subsequently turned into a vampire, he strives to drink blood and get laid(n)

programme.title: Jay Pharoah: Can I Be Me?
programme.desc: Comedian and impressionist Jay Pharoah performs a stand-up routine from the Cutting Room in New York City(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Wreckage. Season three of the smart US comedy drama begins and, post break-up, Marty and the rest of the Pod are enjoying varying degrees of success(n)

programme.title: Safelight
programme.desc: A teenage boy (Evan Peters) and a young prostitute (Juno Temple) take a road trip up the California coast to photograph lighthouses. However, her abusive pimp could cause the journey to end in violence in this gritty drama from writer/director Tony Aloupis(n)

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: In this charming family film, a London orphan named Molly Moon studies hypnosis, and uses her powers to escape from her orphanage and search for a friend who was adopted. At the same time, a thief wants her help with a heist(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: House Not Home
programme.desc: A gender fluid teenager navigates bullying and violence from peers and rejection from a parent on the journey out of the closet(n)

programme.title: Brand: A Second Coming
programme.desc: Profiling comedian Russell Brand on his journey from addict to an activist whose goal is to encourage a worldwide economic revolution(n)

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: A small-town girl joins the military and becomes a guard at Guantanamo Bay, where she forges a delicate, transformative bond with an inmate who raises some compelling questions about his incarceration in this powerful drama(n)

programme.title: Bubble Boy
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal, the young star of the critically well-received October Sky (1999), follows up that film with this offbeat comedy. Gyllenhaal stars as Jimmy Livingston, a teenager with an immune system deficiency who has spent his entire life living in a plastic bubble under the doting, overprotective care of his mother (Swoosie Kurtz). Jimmy is in love with his next-door neighbor Chloe (Marley Shelton), so when he learns that she has left for Niagara Falls in order to be married, he's devastated. He quickly assembles a portable "bubble suit" and sets out on a 2,755.8-mile odyssey in order to stop her and proclaim his affection. Along the way, Jimmy experiences a number of adventures, including encounters with freaks, bikers, rock stars, and a cult. Bubble Boy is a comic riff on the classic TV movie The Boy in the Plastic Bubble (1976), which starred a young John Travolta(n)

programme.title: W. Kamau Bell: Semi-Prominent Negro
programme.desc: Comedy special featuring socio-political comedian W. Kamau Bell, who brings his characteristically biting take on the real issues of contemporary America from gentrification to raising his family in a post-Obama nation(n)

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: A supernatural being torments a family one year after the death of their daughter(n)

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: Bigfoot stalks five friends during a camping trip in the East Texas wilderness(n)

programme.title: The Wraith
programme.desc: He is a phantom -- a wraith. He is a mysterious, otherworldly stranger. An evil force took his life. Now an unearthly power has brought him back. He has a destiny to fulfil, a woman's love to reclaim, and he's determined to wage a vendetta against the young punks who put him in this situation in the first place. This supernatural tale pits an enigmatic avenger against a bizarre and brutal band of marauders who have been wreaking havoc on a small desert town. But time soon runs out for The Wraith to reclaim his past and his future as he is pitted against his enemies in this action thriller. With Charlie Sheen, Randy Quaid, Sherilynn Fenn(n)

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: A small-town girl joins the military and becomes a guard at Guantanamo Bay, where she forges a delicate, transformative bond with an inmate who raises some compelling questions about his incarceration in this powerful drama(n)

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: A young homeless couple feed their drug addictions through theft, but their lifestyle comes crashing down when one of them is hospitalized(n)

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: A psycho stalks a group of Internet "models" living in a Webcam house(n)

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: In this relentless and innovative horror film, a 19-year-old woman contracts a sexually transmitted curse after a one-night stand with a handsome stranger. Terrorized by malevolent phantoms, she turns to her friends to find a way out of this nightmare

programme.title: Brad Williams: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Comedian Brad Williams delivers a stand-up set that tackles race and political correctness, as well as how his father raised him to deal with adversity

programme.title: Tooken
programme.desc: Spoof of the "Taken" franchise. An ex-CIA agent who is now a mall- security guard discovers that things are being taken from him. He must team up with his mom, also an ex-CIA agent, to defeat his rival and save his family. Donnie Wahlberg, Jenny McCarthy, Ethan Suplee Co-star

programme.title: American Loser
programme.desc: An aimless slacker runs out of options when he gets kicked out of his home, but he soon moves in with a woman whom he met at a support group for people with relationship problems. Eventually, she inspires him to get his life together

programme.title: Inside Comedy
programme.desc: Mel Brooks; Carl Reiner. Guests include Mel Brooks and Carl Reiner

programme.title: Sneakers
programme.desc: The government blackmails the leader of a high-tech security group into finding a decoder, and will drop criminal charges against him if he is successful

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Chris (Helen Mirren) and Annie (Julie Walters) are two very different women who live in a small village in the Yorkshire Dales. Their friendship is put to the test just when their relationship needs to be stronger than ever. When Annie's husband dies of leukemia, Chris organizes a campaign to raise funds for the local hospital. Her plan is to produce a calendar featuring photographs of the village women performing their traditional tasks. But the proposal has an original twist: the women will pose in the nude. The pictures are known all across the country and the women become famous

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: During the miners' strike of 1984, a group of gay activists form an unlikely union with a Welsh mining community

programme.title: Spring Broke
programme.desc: The raucous history of the infamous spring break revelries in Daytona Beach, Fla., that began in the early 1960s is chronicled

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Neil LaBute wrote and directed this kinky comedy-drama, about two colleagues who explore their sexuality over the course of a long layover. Stuck in Albuquerque during a business trip, Les (Matthew Broderick) and Natalie (Alice Eve) decide to get out of the airport and see the sights. While Natalie considers cheating on her partner, Les investigates a drunken affair he had the last time he was in the city -- only he doesn't remember if it was with a man or a woman. Dirty Weekend made its world premiere at the 2015 Tribeca Film Festival

programme.title: The DUFF
programme.desc: A teenager is devastated to learn that her classmates consider her the "designated ugly fat friend". In response, she enlists help in regaining her confidence, and plots to dethrone the school's queen bee

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: Craig Brewer's two-handed drama begins after Rae's soldier husband is called up for duty in Iraq. She goes off the rails, sleeping around until one encounter leaves her semi-naked in the road, where she's found by Lazarus, who's nursing his own hurt of a cheating wife. Determined to save Rae from herself, he initially imprisons her in his home but, as the two form a relationship, so she begins to understand the reasons behind her actions

programme.title: The Descent 2
programme.desc: The Descent editor Jon Harris makes the leap to the director's chair in this sequel to Neil Marshall's claustrophobic 2005 creature flick. Sarah Carter (Shauna MacDonald) has managed to escape from the Appalachian cave system where all of her friends were killed by "crawlers" -- primordial humanoids who have adapted to living in the subterranean darkness. In hopes that some of the spelunkers may have survived, Sheriff Redmond Vaines rounds up his deputies for a rescue mission, and decides to take Sarah along as a guide. At first Sarah has no memory of the horrors that wait below, but the further the team pushes into the cave, the more vivid her flashbacks become until the reality of the situation sinks in. Now, the rescue crew is being hunted from the shadows by a whole new clan of crawlers that are even more vicious and terrifying than their predecessors. Sarah was lucky to make it out of the caves alive the first time -- will that luck carry over into her second descent, or is she doomed to die while dreaming of escaping into the sunlight?

programme.title: Turbulence 3: Heavy Metal
programme.desc: The third time's the charm for terror in the sky in this action-packed drama. Rock superstar Slade Craven has decided to hang up his rock & roll shoes and has planned something very special for his final show -- instead of a typical concert in some sports arena, he'll play a set aboard a 747 jumbo jet, flying from Los Angeles to Toronto, with the gig broadcast live to millions of fans over the Internet. But what Craven didn't count on is the presence of a deranged fan with a gun who attempts to hijack the plane, throwing the show into chaos and putting the lives of everyone aboard the jet at risk. Turbulence 3: Heavy Metal stars Rutger Hauer, Joe Mantegna, Craig Sheffer, and Gabrielle Anwar(n)
